lead_paragraph: Marc-André Fleury made 31 saves Tuesday night for his fourth shutout of the season and the Pittsburgh Penguins clinched a playoff berth with a 2-0 victory over the Devils.
snippet: Marc-André Fleury made 31 saves Tuesday night for his fourth shutout of the season and the Pittsburgh Penguins clinched a playoff berth with a 2-0 victory over the Devils.
